column4: Can anyone help, been trying to activate my nvidia ge-force 5500 graphics card. Installed and activated recommended drivers but they don't work, all I am left with is a blank screen.
what are you doing to try and activate it? please clarify your problem a bit more ;)
I want to activate my cards for 3D effects and to play games, it wont allow me to do this
what have you tried to do so far?
